Title: Insecure State Generation in laravel/socialite
Description: laravel/socialite versions prior to 2.0.9 are found to have an insecure state generation mechanism, potentially exposing the OAuth authentication process to security risks. The issue has been addressed in version 2.0.9 by ensuring that the state is generated using a truly random approach, enhancing the security of the OAuth flow.
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.0.0, all versions starting from 2.0.9
